Study_AbroadObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Study_AbroadObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

validation.validation: The Academic Unit Reference must be an Academic Unit.

Study_Abroad_Data.description: Contains Academic Unit information for a Student Prospect where the Academic Level is optional

validation.validation: The Academic Unit is not valid for the selected Academic Level.
Cannot submit limited capacity options with unlimited option selected.

validation.validation: Other Credit Values must be true in order to submit an Other Credit Type and value combination.
Must set "Repeatable" to true to submit Repeatable Data.
You must specify at least 1 Other Unit Type and Other Unit Value when you select the Other Unit Values check box.

Student_Eligibility_RuleObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: You must enter an eligibility rule that can be used for Course Definitions and Course Section Definitions.
You cannot use an eligibility rule with the qualifier, "has earned grades in academic period."
You must enter an active eligibility rule.
Must select the Billable Activity Behavior to submit Billable Data.
Must select the Enrollable Activity Behavior to submit Enrollable Data.
Schedulable (SCHEDULABLE) is not a valid Activity Behavior for Study Abroad.
You must include "Enrollable & Eligible" as an Activity Behavior in order to submit an eligibility rule.
